name: Royal Bugs (Pachwoom, dphelan7, HSDrummond)
description:
You have reached the lost Bug Island and you happen across the royal bug family. Capture them and use them against each other, but watch out each one has a puzzle in front of them and you must complete it in order to challenge them. Earn trophies to show your progress and beat The Emperor to overcome the island. I hope you enjoy our game and don't give up even if you want to!

Controls: Use mouse to press play and then use WASD to move around.
When in battle scene with the bug use Z to fight, and WASD to choose an attack!
Esc to Pause the game.

Credits
